refnamediv.refpurpose: Display all objects within the view.

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: Resets the view size and the view center such that all displayed objects are within the view.

example.title: Reset view size and center so that all displayed objects are within the view.

listitem.para: The view resets so that all objects displayed can be seen.

refsection.title: BUG REPORTS
